data.system_settings: MacBook Pro, mid-2012, macOS Sierra (Version 10.12.5), Google Chrome, https://discordapp.com Version
data.client_settings: Web <(https://discordapp.com>) - I can't figure out how to get the exact web version.
data.actual_result: It is prepended to the top of your server list as the first server.
data.expected_result: It should be where it was previously moved to in the order of your server list.
data.short_description: When a previously-offline server comes back online, it is prepended to the top of the list rather than where it was previously
data.steps_to_repro: - Join a server that periodically goes offline (usually because it has hit its user cap).- Move it somewhere in the middle of your server list (anything except the first one. I personally put it 4th out of my 40-some servers.) - Observe it going offline and subsequently giving you the (!) icon at the bottom of your server list. - When it comes back online, it is prepended to the top of your server list as the first server, rather than where it was previously moved to.
